content.question: What is mentioned about the town mascot?

choices.label: It is shaped like a local food product.
It represents a character from a folktale.
It was designed by a local artisan.

content.answer: It is shaped like a local food product.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
